samOptiPro 0.1.0

ESS, Rhat, AE, CE and run-level summary

Source: R/assess.R
assess_performance.Rd

Computes, per parameter: ESS, \(\hat{R}\), AE = ESS / (iters * chains), CE = ESS / seconds, and returns a global summary (including total ESS and ESS/s).

Usage

assess_performance(samples, runtime_s, rhat_thresh = 1.01)

Arguments

samples

mcmc.list / mcmc / data.frame compatible with coda.

runtime_s

Total wall time in seconds (numeric).

rhat_thresh

\(\hat{R}\) threshold used for the "OK" proportion (default 1.01).

Value

A list with summary (tibble) and per_param (tibble).
